title: Can anyone tell me where to find timetable for july backlog exams?
content: I got an email it says backlog timetable has already been published in pesuacamy app and website but i am not able to find it. Can anyone tell me where to find it?

comments.body:
I can see it bruh.                                                                                       
Pesu app > Announcements.
Can u share the title of announcement please??
Summer term ESA July24 Final Time Table_BTech
